seriesJson.title: The American people
seriesJson.description: This series examines contemporary American issues through interviews and personal essays.

node.title: Surprise, surprise, part two
node.description: This program, the second of two parts, presents a study of the minds and feelings of American children.

node.title: Surprise, surprise, part one
node.description: This program, the first of two parts, presents a study of the minds and feelings of American children.

node.title: The good old days: A study in nostalgia, part one
node.description: This program, the first of two parts, uses interviews with various Americans to explore American nostalgia in the middle part of the twentieth century.

node.title: The good old days: A study in nostalgia, part two
node.description: This program, the second of two parts, uses interviews with various Americans to explore American nostalgia in the middle part of the twentieth century.

node.title: What is patriotism, part 1
node.description: This program, the first of two parts, uses interviews with various Americans to explore attitudes about patriotism in the middle part of the twentieth century.

node.title: What is patriotism, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of two parts, uses interviews with various Americans to explore attitudes about patriotism in the middle part of the twentieth century.
